definition: north/north side/northern part/to the north of
suffix of a noun of locality
border area of northwest China (i.e. Xinjiang)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 xi1 bei3 bian1 chui2

definition: erhua variant of 北邊|北边[bei3 bian1]

sentences.english: He snorted and then said, “They want to go up north.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧喘着氣，然後說，“他們想去北邊。

sentences.english: At that side also of the tabernacle, that looketh toward the north, he made twenty boards.
sentences.chinese: 爲帳棚的另一面，即北邊，也做了二十塊木板。

sentences.english: The pears are ripening in John Karl's orchard in Bunbartha, Northern Victoria.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞北邊卡歐的果園裏，西洋梨正是成熟期。

sentences.english: Both of the mountains were very high. Just to the north of the mountains lived an old man called Yu Gong who was nearly 90 years old.
sentences.chinese: 山的北邊住着年近90的愚公。

sentences.english: The north tower butts against the outer wall.
sentences.chinese: 北邊那座塔緊鄰着外圍牆。

sentences.english: The North, by contrast, stagnates in isolation and depravation.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，北邊仍然陷於孤立，貧困不堪。

sentences.english: And Philadelphia is only 11 miles north of Swarthmore.
sentences.chinese: 費城在斯沃斯莫爾北邊只有11英里。

sentences.english: Rezon of Damascus was to the north and controlled the major trade route to the east.
sentences.chinese: 北邊的利遜控制以色列往東的主要貿易路線。

sentences.english: inquired one pigeon of another which was peering over the edge of the north parapet.
sentences.chinese: 一隻鴿子問另一隻經常往北邊防護矮牆張望的鴿子。

sentences.english: Beiling is in the north of Shenyang.
Find a little peace and quiet at this pretty cove located just north of Chaweng.
sentences.chinese: 辰夢海灘位於查翁海灘北邊，是一處幽寂安靜的海灣。

sentences.english: Have an authentic Italian dinner in the North End.
sentences.chinese: 到波士頓北邊品嚐義大利道地晚餐。

sentences.english: The light in the north still glimmered .
sentences.chinese: 北邊的亮光仍在微微閃爍。

sentences.english: To our north towered the Crazies, an extension of the Rocky Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在我們北邊聳立的羣山是落基山脈的一部分。

sentences.english: The territory of Manasseh reached the sea and bordered Asher on the north and Issachar on the east.
sentences.chinese: 北邊到亞設，東邊到以薩迦。

sentences.english: He was setting off to the north of Dragon Island where his family lived.
sentences.chinese: 他要跑回龍島的北邊去，那裏住着他的家人。

definition: south/south side/southern part/to the south of
east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
west/west side/western part/to the west of
east, south, west and north/all directions
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
